mapper.insert: insert into lesson(teacher_id , place , begin_time , end_time , class_id) values(#{teacherId} , #{place} , #{beginTime} , #{endTime} , 0)
mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.teacher_id, t1.place, t1.begin_time, t1.end_time, t2.username from lesson t1 left join sys_user t2 on t1.teacher_id = t2.id where t1.deleted = 0 and t1.class_id = 0
select t1.id, t1.teacher_id, t1.place, t1.begin_time, t1.end_time, t2.username from lesson t1 left join sys_user t2 on t1.teacher_id = t2.id where t1.id = #{id}
